citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:05 pm on May, 7
2025. The inspector contacted the licensee by phone and they were out of town and no one else was available to
complete the inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:05 pm on May, 7 
2025. The inspector contacted the licensee by phone and they were out of town and no one else was available to 
complete the inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation 
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
